share on x eh eastman funeral home and norton-eastman funeral home. jun 10 at 1:15 pm 91 files added to the album life. tributes 1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x kk kathy king. jun 10 at 11:23 am kenneth and augusta king and gene, earl, ruth, brenda families purchased the books of love for the family of traskie king. share on x ao andrea oney. jun 9 at 5:45 pm oh no! i am very saddened to hear this. i will sure will miss traskie sitting behind me in church. calling me with updates and, checking on me. my thoughts and prayers for comfort to bill and family! love andrea & familycomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ra rev. s. t. and betty adkins. jun 9 at 3:55 pm condolences to bill, and all the family for the going home of your lovely traskie. we have been friends and family for many years, praying that god will comfort each of you in a special way. lean on the one who cares for us all. she has served this wonderful savior for many years, and now is at home with him. rev. s. t. and i are keeping you in our prayers. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 11. 2:00 pm - 8:00 pm eastman funeral home - greenwich49 west main street. greenwich, oh, us, 44837. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. funeral service. jun 12. 11:00 am north broadway united baptist church290 north broadway street. shelby, oh, us, 44875. get order flowers now for traskie's funeral service life. tributes 365 days of grief support. subscribe eastman funeral home and norton-eastman funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for traskie's funeral service cemetery details. greenlawn cemetery200 w main st. plymouth, oh, us, 44865. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of traskie king kathy king sent flowers to the family of traskie king. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! kendra shupp. jun 11 at 10:05 am sending the family our condolences during this difficult time! doug has been a friend of mine since graduating high school and i know this is beyond hard for him and the whole family! surrounding all of you with love and {{{hugs}}} and god's comforting peace that only he can give! love you all and if there is anything i can do to help just let me know and i will! sincerely, kendra and the shupp family. comment share comment share facebook twitter
